original_title: モア・セクシー 獣のようにもう一度
overview: Yoko and Jiro, the proprietors of a beauty salon in Yokohama, stole Kuwabara's car and got a panda doll by chance. Since then, the two have been targeted by the yakuza organization Shinseikai, and eventually find out that the doll contains drugs...
title: Moa sekushi kemono no yoni mo ichido
